tag_list: behurray-com, behurray, flash-sale, private-sale, membership-only, luxury-sales, brands-designers, top-of-the-brands, new-york-luxury-brands, european-top-designers-brands, daily-sales-at-limited-time
overview:
Behurray is an online retail site dedicated to delivering a unique, exciting daily shopping experience with a curated selection. Behurray business model - A members-only retail site offering a curated selection of men, women, kids, beauty products, home , travel items & wedding package as well .

Behurray provides instant insider access to online private sale space , at up to 60% off retail. Become a member and find something new every day for women, men, kids and home as well as exclusive local services and experiences, and one-of-a-kind travel packages & wedding package as well…..Behurray brings the thrill back to shopping through private, limited time sale.

Behurray have new deals every day . There is only a limited amount of each item so you literally need to login to the site to snag the best stuff. Behurray consistently have a great mix of items for men, women, kids, beauty products, and items for your home.
